meanings.definition: Not willing or inclined; reluctant or opposed.
meanings.sent1: She was unwilling to try the new food.
meanings.sent2: He was unwilling to join the dance class.
meanings.sent3: The cat was unwilling to wear the tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed unwilling to set on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The student's face showed an unwilling expression during the test.

meanings.sent1: The dog was unwilling to go outside in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She was unwilling to wake up early on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The tree seemed unwilling to drop its leaves in autumn.
meanings.sent4: The river appeared unwilling to change its course.
meanings.sent5: The child's face showed an unwillingness to share the toy.
